* Contact: Shaun Crampton
* Make: Toshiba
* Brand: Satellite
* Model: 3000-X4
* Website:

=== Current Issues ===
After 10 minutes of inactivity the display goes blank.  Moving the mouse makes the mouse pointer appear only.  Doing a VT switch remedies the problem.  See LP #207881.

=== System Info ===
<pre>
$ sudo dmidecode -s system-manufacturer
TOSHIBA
$ sudo dmidecode -s system-product-name
S3000-X4
$ sudo dmidecode -s system-version
PS301E-000K8-EN</pre>
